businessDescription: Tony Bart offers a range of permanent makeup (PMU) and cosmetic services in New York, including nano brows, microblading, ombre brows, eyeliner, lip blush, and saline removal.  Also provides Scalp Micropigmentation (SMP) and EMSculpt treatments.  Training courses are available for aspiring PMU artists, with both group and private 1:1 options.

booking.availability: Currently Booking next month for PMU
booking.smp_availability: For SMP booking next month - Scroll to book Scalp Micropigmentation.

services.name: NANO BROWS BY TONY
services.description: Machine Hairstrokes is natural technique that created hairstrokes with machine instead of a blade. This service is good for all skin types & not painful.  Touch up is recommended within 4 weeks ($150).

services.name: COMBO BROWS W MACHINE
services.description: Combo brows is hairstrokes in the front done with machine & shading at the rest of the brows. Last 3-4 years. Custom shape & color.

services.name: MICROBLADING BY TONY
services.description: The most natural technique that mimic your natural hairs throughout the whole brow. Hairstrokes done with the blade. Touch up is recommended within 4 weeks ($100).

services.name: OMBRÉ BY TONY
services.description: Ombré Powder Brows, also known as Powdered Brows are a semi-permanent eyebrow. Ombré Brows creates a soft shaded brow pencil look.  Procedure takes around 1.5-2 Hours. Lasts 3-4 years with proper aftercare & pre-care.  Touch up is recommended within 4 weeks ($150).

services.name: EYELINER by Tony
services.description: Touch up is recommended within 4 weeks ($100).

services.name: LIP BLUSH by Tony
services.description: All work posted on pages of lips is done by Tony only. Kate doesn’t perform Lip Blush procedures. Touch up is recommended within 4 weeks ($100).

services.name: SALINE REMOVAL
services.description: Saline Removal is a lightening procedure to remove any pmu work or body tattoo.Takes up to 5 sessions ( depending on darkness, skin healing & more )

services.name: Scalp Micropigmentation (SMP)
services.description: Cosmetic procedure for the introduction of special pigments into the scalp to create a visual effect of hair density, masking scars on the head, as well as creating the effect of 'shaved hair' with complete baldness. MINIMUM TO NO PAIN. LAST UP TO 3-4 YEARS. SUITABLE FOR BOTH MEN & WOMEN. Takes around 2-4 hours depending on the amount of work needed.
services.notes: ONLY BOOK AFTER CONSULTATION.  Text photo of head to +1 (727) 888-0088 or book Zoom consultation.

group_training.description: Permanent Makeup Brows & Lips New York Seminar. NO LICENSE OR EXPERIENCE NEEDED! Full kit, Training Manuals, Certificate of Completion, Hands on Practice, Support After class, Brows & Lips techniques. Techniques: Ombré brows, combo brows w machine, color correction, intro to nano hairstrokes, lip blush & lip neutralization. Hands on practice on 1 brow model & 1 lips model (models NOT included). Full Kit Included w machine and other tools. Certificate of completion. 6 month support after course. Two detailed training manual books.
group_training.registration: Register for MARCH 28th ONLY & you will be scheduled for ALL 4 DAYS.

options.name: 4 Days Brows & Lips class
options.description: Microblading, combo brows, color correction, lip blush, lip neutralization & *velvet lips*. Includes: 3 hands on models (models provided) & more!

options.name: 3 Days Brows class
options.description: Microblading, combo brows, color correction. Includes: 2 hands on models (models provided) & more!

options.name: 2 Days Lips class
options.description: Velvet lips, Lip Blush & Dark lip neutralization. Includes: 1 hands on models (models provided) & more!

private_training.notes: Advanced classes are offered. Please call us.

policy.booking_agreement: When booking with me you AGREE that you have read the following.
policy.cancellation_rescheduling: Deposits are NON-REFUNDABLE FOR ALL SERVICES & CLASSES! For services - 72 hours notice must be given in order to reschedule & transfer deposit to another day. For training - MINIMUM of 6 week notice must be given in order to transfer the deposit to a different date. The deposit is forfeited if the required notices aren’t given.  The deposit is transferable but NOT refundable to a future date as long as 72 hours notice is given for brow services and 6 week notice for training classes. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO REFUNDS FOR SERVICES OR TRAINING PERFORMED.
policy.no_show: Deposit is forfeited. No future appointments.
policy.late_policy: If you are more than 15 minutes late, your appointment will be cancelled and you will NOT receive a refund. You may schedule a new appointment with a new deposit.  If a deposit was not given, a fee will be charged before you can schedule again. This fee is $100-$200 (subject to change at any time without notice).
policy.general_advice: Please understand that this is a beauty treatment that requires time & patience and can result in me running behind schedule depending on the client I have ahead of you. If you are traveling to me & have to catch a flight, please allow enough time in case your appointment runs longer than expected. I like to take my time with each client
pmu_restrictions: You are pregnant, nursing or diabetic
You are taking any medications that is a blood thinner
You have viral infections or disease
You are under the age of 18
pre_procedure_advice: Do not perform electrolysis one week before procedure
Do not tan 2 weeks prior or have sunburned face
Do you not have any type of facial or peel two weeks prior to treatment
Discontinue vitamin A or Retinol products one month prior to treatment
Do not work out the day of the procedure
Do not have Botox 2 weeks prior
Do not take fish oil or vitamin E one week prior (Natural blood thinners)
Do not tint your eyebrows 3 days before the procedure
Do not drink alcohol 24 to 48 hours before your tattoo
Do not consume coffee before your procedure
Do not take an aspirin or ibuprofen for pain relief (this thins the blood)
lip_blush_restrictions: If necessary, please begin your Anti-Viral medication 3 days prior the procedure.
Make sure to get plenty of rest and drink lots of water to hydrate prior to Lip Blushing.
NO alcohol, caffeinated tea/coffee, or stimulants 48 hours before the procedure.
Avoid the sun and indoor tanning one week prior.
Do not take Aspirin, Niacin, Vitamin E or Advil/Ibuprofen 48 hours before the procedure.
Avoid Fish Oil, Primrose Oil, Prenatal Vitamins, “Hair, Skin & Nail” supplements, Nutritional Shakes 48 hours prior.
Discontinue Retin-A, and Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) at least 6 weeks prior.
lip_blush_requirements: If you get cold sores you will need an antiviral prescription. You must inform your physician of your decision to have permanent cosmetics applied to your lips. Physicians usually instruct you to begin taking it 3 days before the procedure, for a 7-10 day course.

If you have had any type of lip surgery, please consult with the physician about how long you should wait before having cosmetic tattooing on the lips. Most physicians are giving a 3 week “go ahead” after lip filler injections like collagen or Restylane. Although, permanent makeup artists have noticed poor color retention in lips that have received collagen injections within the previous 6 months, and longer for Restylane. There has even been a little pigment migration along lip edges with Restylane. It may be best not to have lip filler injections and permanent lip color within the same year. If the lip surgery involves an incision (like a lip implant), the incision needs to mature about 6 months before tattooing on top of it.

Oral prosthesis dentures/partials/braces/retainers and tongue piercing bars may increase risk of getting bacterial and/or fungal infection from the mouth to the lips. Frequent or recent sinus infection puts lips at risk of infection. Denture wearers generally carry a higher candida/yeast count.
